name: Xeno Rescuer
description:
This is a game for the 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam hosted by WhiteVault, with a limitation of three items and the theme is Strange Influence.

In this game, you are playing as a crew of alien trying to save the baby aliens stranded on Earth. However, Agent Area 61 disguised as normal cars are trying to obtain them. If one of the babies have been captured, you must flee in order to avoid getting caught. You can only create a traffic cone hologram to reroute the cars with a maximum of 3.
